official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 6852) entitled "A Bill for the relief of Colonel John T. Knight" to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 6852, entitled "A Bill for the relief of Colonel John T. Knight," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 6852) entitled "A Bill for the relief of Colonel John T. Knight" to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
